description:
Both lightweight and featuring 3-ply fabric treated with a waterproof finish, it also features Cordura® fabric on the knees, back and ankles for durability and extreme protection, making it ideal for a day of prospection on your hunting territory. In addition, we find water-repellent zippers and fully sealed seams with a waterproofness tested to 20,000 millimeters while offering great breathability, perfect for bad weather and cold winds imposed by Mother Nature without ever getting you wet. Thanks to its many spacious pockets, including two hand warmer pockets with drainage holes in the chest, you won't run out of space and you can warm up your hands after your catch and release.

With its adjustable velcro leg cuffs for an easy fit, its 2 zippered thigh pockets and its adjustable waistband and straps for a versatile fit, these overalls will become your greatest ally during your most beautiful days in nature. water, in the forest or even in the mountains.
name: Hooke Waterproof Offroad Bibs - Mens
